tool_description: Detects and validates security features in documents such as watermarks, holograms, microprinting, and UV-reactive elements.

document_type.description: Type of document to check security features for

country_code.description: ISO country code for country-specific security features

feature_types.description: Array of security feature types to detect

error_messages: Security feature detection failed: Unable to analyze security features in the provided image.
Unknown document type: The specified document type is not in the security features database.
Invalid country code: Use a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
Unsupported feature type: One or more specified feature types are not supported.
Invalid sensitivity value: Sensitivity must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
usage: Provide document image, type, and country code. Optionally specify which security features to detect and sensitivity level.

detected_features.description: Array of security features found in the document

feature_confidence.description: Confidence scores for each detected feature (0.0-1.0)

missing_features.description: Expected security features that were not detected

authenticity_score.description: Overall authenticity score based on security features (0.0-1.0)
